interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Journey Into the Structure of Your Beliefs & How You Create Reality
Review Date: 2012/08/14
Store: Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
Product Description: ['This exclusive interview was filmed live in San Francisco in 2009, and is packed with a variety of practical information on how to identify and change beliefs. Here is your opportunity to learn all about the deeper structure of core limiting beliefs, how they are formed and how they influence your ability to create reality. Robert Dilts and Tim Hallbom are internationally recognized experts in the field of Neurolinguistic Programming, as well as co-authors of the best selling book, Beliefs: Pathways to Health and Well-Being. Dilts and Hallbom have developed many popular techniques for identifying and changing limiting beliefs throughout their expansive careers, and are world renowned for their work with belief systems. Join Kris Hallbom, as she interviews these two pioneers of belief change about their fascinating discoveries and vast experiences with NLP and Belief Applications. By watching this DVD, you will: Learn all about the deeper structure of core limiting beliefs and how they are formed, and why they can be so difficult to identify and change. Discover what a Premature Cognitive Commitment is, and how these unconscious commitments influence your perceptual filters and the world around you. Learn what a belief is, and the four ways for identifying and recognizing core limiting beliefs. Find out new information about how we create reality, and how our perceptions of reality are often influenced by our limiting beliefs. Discover how to identify and change limiting beliefs through Reimprinting, Eye Accessing Cues, and Timeline Orientation Experience Tim and Robert sharing some incredible stories about the power of your beliefs and how they can influence every area of your life including: health, relationships, business and money.']
Average Rating: 1.0
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Actors': 'Robert Dilts, Tim Hallbom'}
Review Text: This DVD has no content- you can google nlp or go to utube and get 100 times more infomation for free. wasnt worth 5 bucks much less what they are asking.
Review Title: Dont waste your money
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Journey Into the Structure of Your Beliefs & How You Create Reality
Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD
['This exclusive interview was filmed live in San Francisco in 2009, and is packed with a variety of practical information on how to identify and change beliefs. Here is your opportunity to learn all about the deeper structure of core limiting beliefs, how they are formed and how they influence your ability to create reality. Robert Dilts and Tim Hallbom are internationally recognized experts in the field of Neurolinguistic Programming, as well as co-authors of the best selling book, Beliefs: Pathways to Health and Well-Being. Dilts and Hallbom have developed many popular techniques for identifying and changing limiting beliefs throughout their expansive careers, and are world renowned for their work with belief systems. Join Kris Hallbom, as she interviews these two pioneers of belief change about their fascinating discoveries and vast experiences with NLP and Belief Applications. By watching this DVD, you will: Learn all about the deeper structure of core limiting beliefs and how they are formed, and why they can be so difficult to identify and change. Discover what a Premature Cognitive Commitment is, and how these unconscious commitments influence your perceptual filters and the world around you. Learn what a belief is, and the four ways for identifying and recognizing core limiting beliefs. Find out new information about how we create reality, and how our perceptions of reality are often influenced by our limiting beliefs. Discover how to identify and change limiting beliefs through Reimprinting, Eye Accessing Cues, and Timeline Orientation Experience Tim and Robert sharing some incredible stories about the power of your beliefs and how they can influence every area of your life including: health, relationships, business and money.']
{'Package Dimensions': '7.1 x 5.42 x 0.58 inches; 2.93 Ounces', 'Media Format': 'NTSC', 'Actors': 'Robert Dilts, Tim Hallbom'}
This DVD has no content- you can google nlp or go to utube and get 100 times more infomation for free. wasnt worth 5 bucks much less what they are asking.
Dont waste your money
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** This user is interested in self-improvement and personal development, specifically related to belief systems and their influence on reality.
- **Learning Style:** Prefers accessible and practical information, likely favoring platforms that provide free or easily accessible resources.
- **Value Sensitivity:** Shows sensitivity to perceived value, indicating a strong expectation for quality and depth in content relative to cost; dissatisfaction expressed for low-value purchases.
- **Critique Approach:** Willing to voice negative feedback on subpar experiences, suggesting a high standard for educational materials.
- **Engagement with Topics:** Engages with complex psychological concepts like Neurolinguistic Programming, indicating a desire for advanced understanding but may be critical when content does not meet expectations.

Overall, the user seeks high-quality, informative resources on personal development, yet exhibits a low tolerance for anything perceived as lacking value or depth.
